text: The history of cricket in the West Indies is covered in the following articles: *History of cricket in the West Indies to 1918 *History of cricket in the West Indies from 1918–19 to 1945 *History of cricket in the West Indies from 1945–46 to 1970 *History of cricket in the West Indies from 1970–71 to 1980 *History of cricket in the West Indies from 1980–81 to 1990 *History of cricket in the West Indies from 1990–91 to 2000 *History of cricket in the West Indies from 2000–01 West Indies History of cricket in the West Indies
title: History of cricket in the West Indies
